README.md

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 HyPar - Hyperbolic-Parabolic Partial Differential Equations Solver: 
00002 HyPar is a finite-difference algorithm to solve hyperbolic-parabolic partial differential
00003 equations (with source terms) on Cartesian grids. It is a unified framework that can handle 
00004 systems of PDEs with arbitrary number of spatial dimensions and solution components. It 
00005 provides the spatial discretization and time integration functions, functions to read and 
00006 write solutions from/to files, as well as functions required to solve the system on parallel 
00007 (MPI) platforms. The physical models define the physics-specific functions such as the exact 
00008 forms of the hyperbolic flux, parabolic flux, source terms, upwinding functions, etc.
00009 
00010 Documentation: http://hypar.github.io/
